name: The flame of Liotes
description:
A game I have created for the Alakajam Game Jam. The theme was spellcasting, but because I thought that there are so many games about magicians out there I tried to go with a different concept. Thats why I have decided to create a game where you aren't the magican, but the magic he casts. Arriving upon the world you realize, that you - as the spell - life and thats why you try to survive by not hitting any of the Zombies.

Its a basic endless survival gamewhere you will rack up a Highscore by surviving. Use WASD for movement and Space to shoot little flames clearing the way for you.

If you start up the game set the graphic settings to ultra. On any lower graphsetting some of the animations don't work properly.
